author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA IS MOVING QUICKLY AWAY FROM BERMUDA AND IS EXPECTED TO BECOME EXTRATROPICAL LATER TODAY...
summary: ...IMELDA IS MOVING QUICKLY AWAY FROM BERMUDA AND IS EXPECTED TO BECOME EXTRATROPICAL LATER TODAY... As of 5:00 AM AST Thu Oct 02 the center of Imelda was located near 32.8, -61.9 with movement ENE at 30 mph. The minimum central pressure was 975 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IMELDA IS MOVING QUICKLY AWAY FROM BERMUDA AND IS EXPECTED TO BECOME EXTRATROPICAL LATER TODAY... title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
